ROBINSON CRUSOE A BURLESQUE IN ONE ACT

CHARACTERS. Europeans. Robinson Crusoe, at once King, Prime Minister, and People. Captain Bailey, of the Brig Betsey Jane, of Bristol. Bella, his one fair daughter, and no more than 45. Will Atkins, Mutineer. Will Fry, Mutineer. Tom Robinson, Mutineer. Tom Smith, Mutineer. Caribs. Hokee Pokee Winkee, Fum or King of the Cannibal Islands. Cokee Stokee, his Chef de Cuisine. Cuttee Stickee his Butcher. The Mysterious Stranger. Attendants and Blackguards. Mutineers and other Blackguards. The Parrot by an extraordinary bird, borrowed for the occasion, but not left alone.
